input_text:
Job Title: Software Engineer Senior

Location: Dearborn, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Seeking an experienced and highly competent Senior Level COBOL Software Engineer/Developer to work on Enhancement, New Development, & Production Support Projects for a mission critical Legacy Application (Vehicle Invoicing and Drafting, VI&D).Vehicle Invoicing and Drafting is a Mainframe/COBOL Legacy application; approx.50+ years old with Online and Batch Programs.The ideal candidate is independent, very organized, with a keen sense of detail and a natural ability to develop solutions.Candidate performs superbly under pressure and can balance a number of disparate projects.The Software Engineer must deliver their project on time and with high quality, according to defined processes.Experience with Agile methodology is a must. Difficult situations and business partner conversations must be handled tactfully.Both the Business and the Team must like you, trust you, and feel comfortable around you. VI&D is a mission critical application and core to Company, so some level of stress is expected. If you're up to the challenge, we look forward to speaking with you.

Skills Required

Strict Process Discipline with exposure to Agile TechniquesLogical/Critical ThinkerCOBOL ExpertJCLVSAMDB2IMS (Strong IMS - Online and Batch)IBM Utilities (file manager, IEB GENER)ENDEVORExcellent/OUTSTANDING Communications Skills (verbal and written)Superb documentation SkillsStrong ability to drive requirements gathering process with Business PartnersSuperior Technical competency with great initiativeStrong can do attitude. with a natural ability to understand a complex Application and interconnections with upstream and downstream Applications

Skills Preferred

Empowered, Friendly, Technically Competent, Responsible, Analytical, Team Player, Problem Solver Should be independent and empoweredExcellent communication and problem solving skills;VERY PROCESS/DETAIL ORIENTED

Experience Required

10+ years of advanced experience working on a complex Legacy Applications

Experience Preferred

Experience with Agile Process and Rally

Education Required

BA+ in Computer Science or related industry

Additional Info

At FastTek Global, Our Purpose is Our People and  Our Planet . We come to work each day and are reminded we are helping people find their success stories . Also, Doing the right thing is our mantra . We act responsibly, give back to the communities we serve and have a little fun along the way.

We have been doing this with pride, dedication and plain, old-fashioned hard work for 24 years !

FastTek Global is financially strong, privately held company that is 100% consultant and client focused .

We've differentiated ourselves by being fast, flexible, creative and  honest . Throw out everything you've heard, seen, or felt about every other IT Consulting company. We do unique things and we do them for Fortune 10, Fortune 500, and technology start-up companies.

Benefits

Our benefits are second to none and thanks to our flexible benefit options you can choose the benefits you need or want, options include:

Medical and Dental (FastTek pays majority of the medical program)VisionPersonal Time Off (PTO) ProgramLong Term Disability (100% paid)Life Insurance (100% paid)401(k) with immediate vesting and 3% (of salary) dollar-for-dollar match

Plus, we have a lucrative employee referral program and an employee recognition culture.

FastTek Global was named one of the Top Workplaces in Michigan by the Detroit Free Press in 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 , 2022 and 2023!

To view all of our open positions go to: https://www.fasttek.com/fastswitch/findwork

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/fasttekglobal

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/fasttekglobal

Find us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/fasttek

You can become a fan of FastTek on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fasttekglobal/

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
